overview: The true, harrowing story of a young Jewish girl who, with her family and their friends, is forced into hiding in an attic in Nazi-occupied Amsterdam.
tagline: Hollywood has never made a greater suspense story... a more tender love story... or a finer human drama!
cast: Millie Perkins|Joseph Schildkraut|Shelley Winters|Richard Beymer|Gusti Huber
